comments:
SunOS cyclone 5.8 Generic_108528-19 sun4u sparc SUNW,Ultra-5_10
JRE 1.4.2_01
Eclipse 3.0 M5 build 200311211210

Problem
-------
Two exceptions occurred when running a default feature project.

Procedure
---------
1. Select File->New->Project from the workbench menu bar.

2. From the 'New Project' wizard, select 'Plug-in Development' adn 'Feature 
Project' sub option.

3. Set the name of the feature to "Sample Feature" and press Next.

4. Set the feature id to "com.example.feature", feature version to "1.2.2". 
Feature provider to "Example". Click Finish.

5. Select any 'plugin' or 'plug-in fragment' projects defined in the current 
workspace from the list of projects in the 'New Feature Project' wizard. (if 
there are any)

6. Click Finish in the New Feature Project wizard.

7. Select Upate URLs and select New->Update URL from its context menu.

8. In the properties view change the label of the update URL to Our Update Site 
and URL to htpp:\\www.eclipse.org

9. Click on the Sample Feature feature.xml.

10. Select the "feature.xml" item in the Sample Feature project in the pachage 
explorer, and from its context menu select "Create Ant Build File" under the 
PDE Tools sub-menu.

11. Select "Run ANT" from the context menu of the Sample Feature build.xml file 
in the Pachage Explorer view...an click "Run" in the displayed window.


Expected Results
----------------

The Run completes with no exceptions.

Observed Results
----------------

Run completed but 2 exceptions were generated. See below.

Note(s)
----
The problem is reproducible.


Note...this message occurs after execution of step 10 described above.
!SESSION Nov 28, 2003 13:07:34.637 ---------------------------------------------
java.version=1.4.2_01
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.

file:/cyclonedsk/rational/dfigoni/eclipse/

resources plug-in will safely fall back to using java.io.File functionality.
^Ccyclone:/cyclonedsk/rational/dfigoni/myWorkSpace/.metadata(9)

Note...
The Sample Feature feature.xml dialog box (when user chooses "Run ANT") says..
file:/cyclonedsk....feature.xml:6: Config file is not of expected XML type

Note...these are generated after the run is completed (step 11 above)
